item.description:
Based on the poll result we will continue with Schopenhauer. We (participants of the last meeting) decided to read an abridged version of The World as Will and Representation. The book is:
The World As Will and Idea
Edited by David Berman
Publisher: Everyman Paperback Classics; Abridged edition
ISBN: 0460875051

On the next meeting we will discuss pages 3 through 94, that is book 1 and 2 and their supplement. I hope many of us will enjoy reading this abridged version. I again suggest reading the Schopenhauer article in the Stanford Encyclopedia of Philosophy:
http://plato.stanford...
http://plato.stanford...

Good luck, hope to see you soon!
Andras
